caseTitle: [Against the judgment dated 16.12.2009 passed in Constitution Petitions No. 76 to 80 of 2007] --- NRO Case
tagline: The petition, seeking review of the judgment of this Court vide which the National Reconciliation Ordinance, 2007 was declared void ab initio, neither discloses discovery of a new important matter nor evidence of which the petitioner was not aware of at the time of hearing of the main petition to bring it to the notice of Supreme Court. Moreover, the application seeking permission to argue the review petition by the counsel who admittedly did not appear for the petitioner in the main case is violative of Order XXVI, Rule 6 of the Supreme Court Rules, 1980. Review petition is dismissed accordingly.
